At USJunkYards.com, we buy junk cars and offer junk car removal services nationwide, with the exception of Puerto Rico. Get an instant quote and cash for your junk car today!

The actual junk removal simply requires appropriate strength and a fleet of trucks.

We cover the whole USA

Scheduling pickups and finding the right drop-off points are the two major challenges for a junk removal business owner
